name: Mycology
description: A study of the biology of fungi with emphasis on their life histories, morphology, classification, ecology and significance to man. Laboratory sessions include the collection, culture, and identification of a wide variety of fungi. In addition, several experiments illustrating important aspects of fungal physiology and development are performed in the laboratory. [24L, 36P]
prerequisites: (BIO152H5, BIO153H5) / any 200 level course in BIO.
